review: Easy to set up, if you are prime customer, it comes registered to your name. A lot of applications are available. Screen mirroring, a desirable feature , is a little difficult to set up, and it doesn't always work. I like the remote control, it's compact and precise. Ibelieve you get a lot for your money.
author: Ben Pesantes

review: It works great in my house with access to most of the apps I want to use. The standard remote control is good and the phone app for remote control is outstanding. A game remote control is available, which I'll probably get next. I hope Amazon continues to add additional apps for access by the Fire TV Stick.
author: PW "PhilW"

review: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. Seems far superior to roku, which a friend has.
author: John Langmaid

review: It doesn't work if your internet. Isn't fast enough.

review: Amazing.  It has and will continue to change the way we interface with entertainment.  We will no longer be tied to what and when network executives call entertainment.  Best purchase in years.

review: Easy set up, but I have to get used to the new screen appearance.  Very satisfied.
